home blog

questions which you might want hear answers to

Q: why the hell does your website has this domain and pages look like this??
A: domain part: idk i just was just browsing something online and saw .rip domain and then i thought about ame (nso) for some reason and it clicked and i was like "oh wow this sounds great i really should do this" and so i did. initially i though of taking akuyu.dev but then this idea popped up, so yeah, not exactly inspiring
design part: because i am not particularly good at coming up with graphics-related things so i just got inspired by nso's window layout and decided to commit to the bit. at first i had much more interesting idea but then i scrapped it because i dont know how to work with graphics in browsers so i decided to delay it and went with this

Q: you piss me off and you should grow up and change as a person!!
A: sorry... but also nope i am not really willing to change or grow up for that matter, i do sound more normal irl when i talk to people and they seem to like me so idk, draw conclusions yourself

Q: wow i think ur cool what do you even do in your life?
A: yeah no i am not cool by any means and my life is not even interesting, just a regular life. its not that boring though, sometimes i get incredible human to human interactions which leave me perplexed (maybe i should get a separate page to share them, idk)

Q: what do you like?
A: sleeping. but i dont get enough of sleep.... i also really really like talking about my interests

Q: what do you not like then?
A: pretentious people and fake people. like really dont like them. i also dont like overly serious people. like imagine always being serious - that is no fun, especially when you try to approach people like that, theres literally no angle to do that from
i also dont like heat and hot weather, absolutely disgusting, winter and lukewarm places for the win (although summer evening are incredible and probably only good thing about warm/hot seasons)

Q: you mentioned interests, what are you interested in?
A: i used to play a lot of games (mostly indie), so naturally i like games. it would be logical to list games i like here but eeh, dont wanna (although you can probably see one that i really like already :^))
i also really really like music i listen to and im not limited to one genre (although theres definitely a dominating one)

Q: do you "fw" [some specific thing]?
A: quick and inaccurate answer: if this thing is extremely popular then theres a good chance that no, otherwise almost always yes. in any case you can just ask me directly if you want to know for sure

Q: where are you from? how old are you? ...and other not so interesting questions
A: knowing answers would change nothing so not telling... ill let this be a small guessing game for now though, tbh it shouldnt be that hard to guess (hint: i am far from being old and im located somewhere in eu)

this concludes qa page for now, might add/remove entries in the future.
